propositions.text: A modern woman unexpectedly travels through time to ancient times.
She experiences confusion and shock upon arriving in an unfamiliar ancient setting.
She discovers memories of the original owner of her body, confirming her time travel.
She encounters an ancient general named Li Hao.
Li Hao questions her presence and offers her shelter.
She struggles to adapt to ancient life and customs.
She learns ancient etiquette and hides her modern identity.
Emotional bonds form with Li Hao and another man, Zhang Ran.
Li Hao offers protection and shows care, creating emotional conflict.
Zhang Ran provides companionship through intellectual discussions.
A crisis emerges with bandits attacking near the military camp.
Li Hao is injured, and she risks her life to save him using modern tactics.
She seeks a way to return to the modern era.
She discovers a legend about a time portal and performs a ritual to return.
She parts with Li Hao and Zhang Ran in an emotional farewell.
Back in the modern era, she reflects on her journey as a profound emotional experience.

concepts.name: Time Travel
concepts.context: Central theme of crossing between modern and ancient times.

concepts.name: Ancient Life
concepts.context: Adaptation to historical customs and challenges.

concepts.name: Emotional Conflict
concepts.context: Torn feelings between two men and two eras.

concepts.name: Crisis
concepts.context: Bandit attack and personal risk to save others.

concepts.name: Return
concepts.context: Journey back to the modern world via a time portal.

hierarchy.structure: The document follows a chronological narrative structure, divided into chapters that trace the protagonist's journey from modern to ancient times, her struggles and relationships, a critical event, and her eventual return.
